column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////My boyfriend and I went here with high expectations since we had seen and heard a lot of good things. We went during brunch and got the tatchos and the shrimp and grits and a couple drinks. The tatchos were not as advertised
column2: they had no cheese on them and basically tasted like extremely salty chili tots with an egg. Nothing special. The shrimp and grits just tastes like it a can of salsa was poured on it. No interesting flavors or seasoning. very small portion of the grits.
